title: Drawing, "Bacchus, Design for Vaulted Ceiling, Sala dei Legislatori, Palazzo Conti-Sinibaldi, Faenza", 1787–1802
medium: Pen and ink, brush and bistre wash over black chalk on laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in ink: Bacco inv delle vigne. At top left: 9V.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Bacchus shown in profile, turned toward right and seated.  He pours wine from pitcher into bowl. Vine, at right. Thyrsus and crouching panther in left foreground. Inscribed, Bacco inv delle vigne. And inscribed at top left, 9V.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Bacchus, Design for Vaulted Ceiling, Sala dei Legislatori, Palazzo Conti-Sinibaldi, Faenza", 1787–1802.
1787–1802. Pen and ink, brush and bistre wash over black chalk on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3432.
